marker.name: Kayak Point
marker.stedetails:
Kayak Point
Sites: 2
Water: From March-Oct, closest water is near shelter #10, 25 yards W of the site. Nov-Feb, water is available in restrooms at the center of the park.
Fees: $10.00 per boat per night. Details at: https://snohomishcountywa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/47982
Max People: 5 (one party per night)
Max Nights: 1
Reservations: Yes. Call 360.652.7992

Kopachuck State Park

Max Nights:
Reservations: No

marker.name: Oak Bay County Park
